alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chemung, southwestern Tioga and northwestern Bradford Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gillett, or 10 miles west of Chemung, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Southport, Barton, Sayre, Waverly, Athens, Ridgebury, Litchfield, South Waverly and Wellsburg. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 59 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
